name: vehicle_attributes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_api.
Tool description: Search vehicles sold in the United States by year, make, model, trim, engine, body, mileage, VIN decoder and more.
API description: Fetches all available options for a given vehicle attribute using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

attribute.description: The attribute options to be returned. Defaults to 'bodies.type'.
